name: Traveling Large Group Workshop Deposit
description:
By purchasing this listing you are putting down a deposit for one of Keri's Large Group Traveling Workshops. Deposits are NON-REFUNDABLE. Final balances are due no later than 30 days prior to workshop date.

Keri Meyers Photography offers Large Group Traveling Newborn Workshops throughout the year. Traveling workshops are a one day comprehensive and intense learning experience with three newborn models. We will cover camera settings, Keri's studio lighting set-up,  white balance and how to get the perfect exposure and best image SOOC. Keri will show you how to master posing, transitioning, soothing techniques and how to work with parents. You’ll dive into post processing and learn how Keri gets those creamy skin tones. Please note there is no hands-on posing with large group traveling workshops - Keri will be the only one handling babies.  All images that you take during the workshop can be used to build your online portfolio and for marketing purposes if desired.

Tuition | $1800 USD

Duration | 1 day class from 8:30am to 6:00pm (detailed schedule available upon request)

Attendees | limited to 8 photographers per class

Registration | See registration dates below for specified workshops

Payment | $500 USD retainer to reserve your spot. Final payment ($1300) due 30 days prior to workshop date.

Cancellation | $500 USD retainer/booking fee is NON-REFUNDABLE. If you are unable to make the workshop your tuition will be refunded in full (excluding the $500 deposit) if we are able to fill your spot.

Content | During our time together we will cover session workflow, Keri's studio lighting set up, camera settings, white balance and how to get the perfect exposure and best image SOOC. I’ll show you my posing, transitioning and soothing techniques and how to work with parents. We’ll dive into post processing and how to get those creamy skin tones. You will be able to take all the images that you take during the workshop to build your online portfolio and for marketing purposes. Not sure the class is for you? Please take a look at our Workshop Reviews from past attendees.

Includes | Light breakfast, snacks, drinks & lunch
KMP's Clean & Classic Action
KMP's No More Purple & Red Hands/Feet Action
10+ pages of detailed Workshop Review Notes
Gift Certificate to The Shop 
Swag bag full of discount codes and goodies from workshop sponsors

Requirements | basic knowledge of Photoshop, a DSLR (it is assumed you know how to shoot in manual mode and have basic understanding of aperture, ISO and shutter speed), a 35mm or 50mm lens, memory cards, macro lens and laptop. Macro and laptop are optional.

After deposit has been made you will receive a more detailed itinerary and registration packet via e-mail. Please be advised all attendees are required to sign a Contract stating that they will refrain from teaching a newborn photography workshop or 1:1 mentoring after taking a KMP Workshop.

2014 One Day Traveling Workshops | limited to 8 attendees plus host
Atlanta, GA | March 6, 2014

To wait list a particular workshop please submit our Wait List Application.

name: 1:1 and 1:2 Mentoring Deposit
description:
Listing is for deposit on a Keri Meyers Newborn Photography 1:1 or 1:2 Mentoring Session. To see a list of available dates, please visit http://www.kerimeyersphotography.com/newborn-mentoring-opportunities/. 

This is for deposit only and full payment will be due 30 days before workshop date.

Once deposit is made, a full registration packet will be sent to you to complete the registration process.

Tuition | $2000 USD per person - Two day class
*Guided hands-on posing on day two.*

$500 USD deposit/booking fee to hold your spot. Deposit/booking fee is NON-REFUNDABLE UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES. You will receive $100 OFF of your tuition if you pay in full upon registration. Please e-mail us at info@kerimeyersphotography.com if you would like to take advantage of this offer.

Schedule |  will be provided via e-mail

Location | Duvall, Washington (40 minutes east of Seattle)

Class Size | limited to 2 photographers per class

Content | Working with and prepping parents for the newborn session, studio lighting and set-up, achieving a perfect image SOOC including work with shooting angles, soothing techniques and easy transitioning tools, posing, selecting and working with props and digital workflow.

Airport Code | (SEA) Seattle Tacoma Airport

Suggested Lodging |The Redmond Inn 17601 Redmond Way, Redmond, WA 98052 (888)379-694
Hotel Sierra 15785 Bear Creek Pkwy NE, Redmond, WA 98052 (425)497-2000
The Mariott at Redmond Town Center 7401 164th Ave NE, Redmond, WA 98052 (425)498-4000

Included | KMP’s Clean & Classic Action
KMP’s No More Purple & Red Hands/Feet Action
Gift Certificate to The Shop
13 pages of Workshop Review and Session Workflow .pdf viewable on tablet devices
Lunch & Snacks
A bag full of goodies and discount cards from Workshop Sponsors – see the “Sponsors” tab for a complete list our sponsors

Requirements | basic knowledge of Photoshop, a DSLR (it is assumed you know how to shoot in manual mode and have basic understanding of aperture, ISO and shutter speed), a 50mm lens and macro lens (optional). Be advised, Keri does all of her post processing using ACR and Photoshop CS5.

© 2012-2013 Keri Meyers Photography. All rights reserved. 
www.kerimeyersphotography.com

name: KMP-Falling For Fall Photoshop Action
description:
Just in time for our busy holiday shooting season!!

If you prefer a warm sunlit fall feel, this action is for YOU!

The NEW KMP Falling for Fall Action a combination of photoshop adjustments to tune green fresh foliage, into deep rich vibrant reds and golds. 

The action is layered for easy tweaking. The action is compatible with Photoshop versions CS2 and above (I am afraid it is not compatible with Elements). 

Give your images the look of the Peak Autumn Season all year round with a simple click!

After purchase is complete you will receive an e-mail with link to download your action. With your action purchase you will also receive instructions on how to save and load your actions.

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop versions CS2 and higher. It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running actions. Please do not send e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation.

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given. All actions are copyright Keri Meyers Photography. Sharing of actions in unlawful. Violation will result in legal action.

name: *NEW* KMP Clean & Classic Action
description:
My NEW favorite action. I use on EVERY SINGLE image I process. If you prefer a classic and clean style then THIS IS THE ACTION FOR YOU. 

The NEW KMP Clean & Classic Action includes Keri's suggestions for use if you wish to tweak the action at all. The action is layered for easy tweaking. The action is compatible with Photoshop versions CS2 and above (I am afraid it is not compatible with Elements). After purchase is complete you will receive an e-mail with link to download your action. With your action purchase you will also receive instructions on how to save and load your actions.

BY PURCHASING THIS DOWNLOAD YOU ARE AGREEING NOT TO SHARE THE ACTIONS WITH ANYONE.

If you are a newborn photographer, a great companion to the KMP Clean & Classic Action is the KMP No more Purple & Red Hands/Feet Action. Also, be sure to check out our Classic Black & White Action.

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop version CS2 and higher. It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running actions and working with layer masks. Please do not send me e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation.

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given.

Image 3 from Pictured Moments by April | www.picturedmomentsbyapril.com

name: *NEW* KMP No More Purple & Red Hands/Feet Action for Photoshop
description:
We all know our littlest clients have poor circulation resulting in red and/or purple hands and feet making editing somewhat of a challenge. KMP's No More Purple & Red Hands/Feet action will help speed up your workflow and get rid of those troublesome areas. This set included two actions: No More Purple Hands/Feet AND No More Red Hands/Feet. You may run the actions separately or together for desired results.

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop versions CS2 and higher. It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running actions. Please do not send e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation.

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given. All actions are copyright Keri Meyers Photography. Sharing of actions in unlawful. Violation will result in legal action.

name: KMP Holiday Card Template MEGA SET (Set of 16)
description:
SAVE BIG WHEN YOU PURCHASE BOTH 2013 HOLIDAYS SETS!
-SET INCLUDES KMP'S HAPPY HOLIDAYS 2013 SET OF 8 PLUS KMP'S POP OUT 2013 HOLIDAY SET OF 8
-16 TEMPLATES TOTOAL
-SAVINGS OF $92
 
Each Template is completely customizable giving you the freedom to change colors and fonts to fit your clients needs. The templates are layered Photoshop (.PSD) files and are designed to be compatible with Miller's product (WHCC OK too). POP-OUT templates are compatible with Miller's new Pop-Out Press Cards.

Templates are designed to be as simple as possible. Simply drop in your photos, change the text, and you're done. However, to allow for maximum flexibility, in most cases they have also been layered to allow for changes such as modifying colors, removing patterns or overlays, and re-arranging and re-sizing design elements.

**Please note that templates are built to work with PSE and Photoshop CS2 or later. Compatibility with earlier versions of Photoshop cannot be guaranteed. **

A HUGE THANK YOU TO PEAHEAD PRINTS FOR DEVELOPING THIS LINE FOR KMP!

PLEASE DIRECT QUESTIONS ABOUT SIMPLY STATED TEMPLATES TO gina@peaheadprints.com.

name: KMP De*fined Baby Calendar & Collage Set
description:
Now available to photographers is our totally customizable *de*fined baby* calendar and collage templates from Peahead Prints. Each template is completely customizable giving you the freedom to change colors and fonts to fit your clients needs. The templates are layered Photoshop (.PSD) files and are designed to be compatible with Miller's calendar printing as well as all standard square photo print printers.

Templates are designed to be as simple as possible. Simply drop in your photos, change the text, and you're done (you can change color of blocks, too!). However, to allow for maximum flexibility, in most cases they have also been layered to allow for changes such as modifying colors, removing patterns or overlays, and re-arranging and re-sizing design elements.

This set also includes and easy to use action set to easily convert these files from calendar templates (with Millers bleed specifications) to standard square prints, for printing at your print house of choice.

**Please note that templates are built to work with PSE and Photoshop CS2 or later. Compatibility with earlier versions of Photoshop cannot be guaranteed. **

This is a digital download, NO refunds can be given due to the nature of these downloads

name: Blog Collage Photoshop Template
description:
This listing is for Keri Meyers' Blog Collage Photoshop Template. The file is in .psd format and sent as a digital download after purchase.

Basic Photoshop knowledge required for use. It is helpful to have experience working with layers and clipping masks, however, there are instructions for use included.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Due to copyright laws, fonts are NOT included with the templates, however a font list will be given of fonts used. 
-BY PURCHASING THIS DOWNLOAD YOU ARE AGREEING NOT TO SHARE  WITH ANYONE.

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given.
© 2010-2011 Keri Meyers Photography

name: Keri Meyers Color Pop Set including Take The Red Out
description:
Keri Meyers Color Pop is a great go-to action for all your portrait needs. The Color Pop Action Set and Take The Red Out action are compatible with Photoshop versions CS2 and above AND Photoshop Elements. After purchase you will receive an e-mail with link to download your actions. With your action purchase you will also receive instructions on how to save and load your actions.

BY PURCHASING THIS DOWNLOAD YOU ARE AGREEING NOT TO SHARE THE ACTIONS WITH ANYONE.

The Color Pop Action set includes three actions: The Color Pop, Take The Red Out & A Little Retro. 

The Color Pop includes three adjustment layers to pop, brighten and add color to your images. 

The Take the Red Out Action is intended for use on newborn skin. This action quickly allows you to reduce the redness in baby’s skin and allows you to control how much you want to “take out”.

The A Little Retro Action adds a little bit of haze to your image. I suggest running the Color Pop Action first and then running A Little Retro on top of that. You’ll love the new look you get with just one click!

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop version CS2 and higher as well as Photoshop Elements. It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running actions and working with layer masks. Please do not send me e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation. 

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given.

name: Keri Meyers Classic Black & White Action
description:
The Classic B&W Action includes my classic black and white action with subtle toning. The B&W action is soft and works great on indoor and outdoor photos. Keri always runs the Color Pop Action before running the Classic B&W action to get the best results.

The Classic B&W action is compatible with Photoshop versions CS2 and above AND Photoshop Elements. After purchase you will receive an e-mail with link to download your actions. With your action purchase you will also receive instructions on how to save and load your actions.

BY PURCHASING THIS DOWNLOAD YOU ARE AGREEING NOT TO SHARE THE ACTIONS WITH ANYONE.

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop version CS2 and higher as well as Photoshop Elements. It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running actions and working with layer masks. Please do not send me e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation. 

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given.

name: Keri Meyers Sweet Tea Action
description:
The NEW SWEET TEA Action is here! SWEET TEA will give your images a warm golden feel like you are sipping on sweet summer tea.

I suggest running my Color Pop action before running Sweet Tea, but this is not necessary.

Run Sweet Tea over my Classic Black & White action for a new look.

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop version CS2 and higher and PSE Elements 8 and higher ONLY.  It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running actions. Please do not send me e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation. 

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given.

name: Keri Meyers Sweet Sugar Action
description:
The NEW Sweet Sugar Action is here! Sweet Sugar will give your images a sweet, soft hazey look. 

I suggest running my Color Pop action before running Sweet Sugar, but this is not necessary.

Run Sweet Sugar over my Classic Black & White action for a soft, dreamy look.

PLEASE NOTE: These actions were created with CS5 on a Mac and are compatible with Photoshop version CS2 and higher as well as Photoshop Elements. It is the end users responsibility to have basic knowledge of loading and running action. Please do not send me e-mails asking about the use of layer masks and/or installation. 

This is a digital download. NO REFUNDS will be given.

name: Keri Meyers Photography GIFT CERTIFICATE
description:
The perfect gift for birthdays, holidays, baby showers or just because! Get your loved one the gift of capturing time. Just remember...
They are only this little for a little while.

Gift certificates will be mailed upon purchase and include a 4x5 gift certificate with envelope for gifting. Please be sure to include shipping address at checkout.

If you are purchasing a gift certificate redeemable for actions, tutorials, templates and/or slings you will receive a special discount code with your gift certificate. The recipient can use the discount code to purchase their desired items. 

Special requests or questions can be sent to keri.meyers@hotmail.com.
